strand.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a single thin piece of thread, wire, hair etc
strand.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He reached out and brushed a strand of hair away from her face.
strand.translation[0].definitions[1].def: one of the parts of a story, idea, plan etc
strand.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Plato draws all the strands of the argument together.
strand.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a famous street in central London where the Savoy Hotel and many theatres are
